title: Portfolio Website
description: The very website you are viewing! This project demonstrates my skills in creating clean, responsive web applications using a modular JavaScript approach.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce site with user authentication, a shopping cart, and a secure checkout process.

title: Machine Learning Model
description: A machine learning model for predicting housing prices based on various features. I used Python for data analysis and model training.

title: Mobile Game
description: A simple 2D mobile game built with Unity. It features a fun, arcade-style gameplay loop.
